title: Why banning Twisted Fate for 3 days?
body: To be honest, it's really tiring to wait for Riot to reactivate Twisted Fate.  What has happened, that has caused Twisted Fate to be banned from using for 3 days straight?  What issue caused it to be banned for so long?

replies.body:
https://www.reddit.com/r/leagueoflegends/comments/4x81fy/twisted_fate_has_been_disabled_due_to_in_game/

> [{quoted}](name=swordstoo,realm=)
>
> Mikael's Crucible would self-cast with every W cast, even if on cooldown.

Twisted Fate is currently disabled due to an in-game issue.  Unfortunately, I don't have more visibility than that, but we will continue to provide updates on our[ service status](http://status.leagueoflegends.com/#na) page.  For now, let's just consider that our friend is on a much deserved vacation and relaxing by the pool with Graves.
we found an issue on your issue so you could issue while you issue!
